justification: A’s rationale is A-centric (TE upgrade, playoff schedule) and ignores B’s preferences (dual-threat QBs, rookies, playoff schedule focus) and B’s TE scarcity. It also conflicts with A’s injury-averse profile by targeting a Doubtful TE. While a WR-for-TE swap is structurally plausible, it’s weakly aligned with both managers’ incentives and fails to argue why B would part with a TE with a friendly playoff schedule. Explanation is brief and generic.
